actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Transportation to, as soon as practicable after the date of enactment of this Act, prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations governing the humane treatment of animals transported in air commerce.
